movies.title: Bobby
movies.plot: In 1968 the lives of a retired doorman, hotel manager, lounge singer, busboy, beautician and others intersect in the wake of Robert F. Kennedy's assassination at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 22 nominations.

movies.title: Elvis & Nixon
movies.plot: In 1970, a few days before Christmas, Elvis Presley showed up on the White House lawn seeking to be deputized into the Bureau of Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs by the President himself.

events.title: Elvis Presley leaves Memphis for Los Angeles
Elvis Presley spends the day in LA before flying to Washington DC
Elvis Presley meets Richard Nixon at the White House
